item.title: Scar-Lead Salvation for PC coming west on May 29
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/scar-lead-salvation-for-pc-coming-west-on-may-29

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

No information to share about the PlayStation versions.

Idea Factory International will release Compile Heart and Neilo‘s newly announced science-fiction roguelite third-person shooter Scar-Lead Salvation for PC via Steam on May 29, day and date with its Japanese release, the company announced.

While the game will be launching for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 alongside PC in Japan, an Idea Factory International representative told Gematsu that currently only the PC version is planned for release in the west, and that it has no information to share on the PlayStation versions at the moment.

The PC version will feature both English and Japanese voice-overs, as well as English, French, Spanish, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese subtitle options. It is currently unclear whether the PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 versions will feature these same language options.

If you missed our previous coverage, read more about the game’s story, characters, and gameplay mechanics here. Visit the newly launched English teaser website here.
